div.p: “It is with great joy and excitement I serve the district as your elementary principal and schools superintendent. I have been a Warhawk from the beginning, starting with my parents. I invite you to take part in partnering along with us and help make each and every year a great one to remember here at North Mahaska.”

div.h2: We want to hear from you!

p.strong: The Iowa Department of Education is gathering data as a census for both students with and without an IEP.

div.p: This is a brief five-question survey that will only take a few moments of your time. The survey will be open until June 30.

p.strong: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey!

div.p: April 17, 2020 North Mahaska Family, Today, Governor Kim Reynolds announced that all schools in Iowa will remain closed through the end of the school year to help prevent the further spread of COVID-19. This announcement will continue to affect all North Mahaska...

img.alt: Meal Request Form | Week of April 20

h2.a: Meal Request Form | Week of April 20

div.p: Each week during school closure, there will be a meal request form available for anyone 18 and under to receive breakfast and lunch. Each person receiving a meal MUST fill out the form so we can have an accurate count on the meals to prepare. Fill out the Meal Request...

div.p: Dear Parent / Guardian: We hope this letter finds you and your family healthy and finding the positive in each day. While we can’t control the global pandemic, we can control how we choose to respond. It is our hope you are using this gift of time to enjoy one another...
